lexUnit.name: shoot.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: film or photograph (a scene, film, etc.).

sentence.text: SYDNEY ( Reuter ) -- The government has decided to ban mining in most of the Kakadu wilderness park , where the film Crocodile Dundee was shot .
